attributes.action: create a law that puts "British" as prority rather than IMIGRANTS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have had enough of immigrants being better off than the BRITISH because of OUR GOVERNMENT, They get the houses, the jobs, lesser sentences for crime, do not adhere to OUR rules, kill!, better lifestyles, absolutley everything, what about EQUAL RIGHTS!!! we the BRITISH are now the MINORITY, i along with the signed below want to see better rights for us which includes Racism targeted towards the british not just the foreigners and immigrants, equal oppurtunities in housing, jobs, etc. For crime punishments ALL sentences should be the same wether or not we are british, foreign or an immigrant. Obviously the worse the crime the worse the punishment. Give us BRITAIN back!

rejection.details:
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/british-rights1/
Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
